LF015.LF015_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf16"/][UE:Meta key="b85a6331a8a14556acfc1f3bbd268c22" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Word is that you saved me?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thank you.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I'm grateful.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b85a6331a8a14556acfc1f3bbd268c22" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf16"/]Boris[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] An author who can't seem to
write a single sentence anymore...
LF015.LF015_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf16"/][UE:Meta key="67315a7d9a764492a9de7936584191fd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I needed inspiration for my new book,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so
this trip was going to help me find that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I never expected to end up stranded.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="67315a7d9a764492a9de7936584191fd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]But thanks to that experience,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I realized
I should keep my mind open to even the
most unexpected sources for new ideas.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="67315a7d9a764492a9de7936584191fd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I just need to,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] figure out how to
implement them in my work.
LF015.LF015_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf16"/][UE:Meta key="47a1dc8261d04d7880a463904fda4719" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm not proud of how I acted when my first
book received so much praise.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I really let
it go to my head.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="47a1dc8261d04d7880a463904fda4719" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]It made me believe I was better than
everyone else![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="47a1dc8261d04d7880a463904fda4719" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Even though what it really came down to
was luck and good timing.
LF015.LF015_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf16"/][UE:Meta key="a15fbc64c42342c18238fbd5fb4d5e3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I look...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]pale?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I had a nightmare
last night.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a15fbc64c42342c18238fbd5fb4d5e3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]My editor showed up in my dream.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
He demanded...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a15fbc64c42342c18238fbd5fb4d5e3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]"Submit a plan for your next book and get
busy writing!"
LF015.LF015_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf16"/][UE:Meta key="c48e71b3925d4fe191ddc458fea0c715" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]My memories from my time as a leafling
are rather vague...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c48e71b3925d4fe191ddc458fea0c715" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The one thing I do remember is the sense
of feeling trapped becoming stronger.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's
like I was locked up inside of a dark cave.
LF015.LF015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf16"/][UE:Meta key="d200a61d4e3f46a188efe522b10abe2e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]After witnessing the way you confront
obstacles,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've realized my authorial life
has been spent running away from things.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d200a61d4e3f46a188efe522b10abe2e" Scale="1"/]I ran away from my insistent editor,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] from
my persistent writer's block,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and even
from the fans who loved my work.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d200a61d4e3f46a188efe522b10abe2e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]But I feel changed now![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm going to focus
on writing the next books for my fans who
are out there waiting for them!
LF015.LF015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf16"/][UE:Meta key="3203e7149b794896b7c022c3260d1a5a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]How about this for a story?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3203e7149b794896b7c022c3260d1a5a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]The protagonist is a destitute adventurer
chasing after treasures.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3203e7149b794896b7c022c3260d1a5a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]When his ship wrecks on an uncharted
planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he finds a land of rainbow seas
and gleaming mountains of treasure.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3203e7149b794896b7c022c3260d1a5a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]But there's also a mysterious shadow
stalking him![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3203e7149b794896b7c022c3260d1a5a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]What do you think?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Sounds fun and
suspenseful,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?
LF015.LF015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf16"/][UE:Meta key="fddc65ce9cf64b70ad1a44b0917b420e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The protagonist fills up his spaceship
with treasures.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fddc65ce9cf64b70ad1a44b0917b420e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]But he's stuck there without fuel when
fierce monsters attack![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fddc65ce9cf64b70ad1a44b0917b420e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]How will he ever escape from this
uncharted planet?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fddc65ce9cf64b70ad1a44b0917b420e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]I'm beginning to get a clear vision of how
the story ends.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] This one's going to be a
masterpiece for sure!
LF015.LF015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf16"/][UE:Meta key="272602c25efa47fe979ca291053e2498" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I feel like I've finally found the light after
trudging through a long,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] dark tunnel.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="272602c25efa47fe979ca291053e2498" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]Now ideas are popping up in my head like
popcorn.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I feel as if I could write a book
about anything!
LF015.LF015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf16"/][UE:Meta key="b2549282ec074e789d699798b3dfae8e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I needed inspiration for my new book,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so
this trip was going to help me find that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I never expected to end up stranded.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b2549282ec074e789d699798b3dfae8e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]But thanks to that experience,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I realized
I should keep my mind open to even the
most unexpected sources for new ideas.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b2549282ec074e789d699798b3dfae8e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I just need to,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] figure out how to
implement them in my work.
LF015.LF015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf16"/][UE:Meta key="640147060a1e48c0b3c49e52673be79a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm not proud of how I acted when my first
book received so much praise.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I really let
it go to my head.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="640147060a1e48c0b3c49e52673be79a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]It made me believe I was better than
everyone else![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="640147060a1e48c0b3c49e52673be79a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Even though what it really came down to
was luck and good timing.
LF015.LF015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf16"/][UE:Meta key="0dd57a804e404ab489b78d3be4df75d7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I look...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]pale?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I had a nightmare
last night.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0dd57a804e404ab489b78d3be4df75d7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]My editor showed up in my dream.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
He demanded...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0dd57a804e404ab489b78d3be4df75d7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]"Submit a plan for your next book and get
busy writing!"
LF015.LF015_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf16"/][UE:Meta key="8b62790a9d3249ff8f2f125f33bd9afe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]My memories from my time as a leafling
are rather vague...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8b62790a9d3249ff8f2f125f33bd9afe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The one thing I do remember is the sense
of feeling trapped becoming stronger.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's
like I was locked up inside of a dark cave.
LF015.LF015_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf16"/][UE:Meta key="78c1d7cf0d6942c0a7afec3f82992637" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]That's a great idea![etc:Wait frame="15"/] A space dog goes
with the protagonist,[etc:Wait frame="15"/] their bond growing
stronger despite communication barriers.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="78c1d7cf0d6942c0a7afec3f82992637" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]This is literary gold![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've decided you'll be
the partner of the protagonist in my
latest novel!
LF015.LF015_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf16"/][UE:Meta key="3d4ba402d87c4251a94a21c880cdfe35" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]An emotional story with animals...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Who
doesn't like that combination?
LF015.LF015_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf16"/][UE:Meta key="27d311fdf4164b1aa3f23d6003f3ee77" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]The more I look at you, the more you look
like me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Maybe I can take advantage of
this and have you talk to my editor.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="27d311fdf4164b1aa3f23d6003f3ee77" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Of course,[etc:Wait/] I'm joking![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'd never leave
someone to deal with my problems while I
go on an adventure to find book ideas...
